title: Ekko E Bug ? ? ?
body:
I was playing Ekko against Bot's in a 4v5 on Summoner's Rift. Just to get the feel of him. I tried to kill baron got to 20% HP and left. Then E'ed the Scuttle (Jungle mob) behind me and 1 shot it (100% HP to 0%) with just the E dash auto attack. Then went and tried to do it on the other one and barely scratched it with my E. Is this a BUG?

Items:

Will of the Ancients.
Void Staff.
Lich Bane.
Rabadon's Deathcap.
Luden's Echo.
Sorcerer's Shoes (Homeguard).

Buffs:

Red Buff.
Blue Buff.
Elixir of Sorcery.

I had the exact same buffs/items and everything for both attempts.

For the one-shot I had Baron-debuff but that is reduction in Resistances not increase in damage (That is the only difference).

replies.body:
Like Flarefox said, you probably killed one Scuttle Crab several times and the one that you 'one-shot' you'd probably only killed once or twice (or not at all).

But also, eww. Do me a favour and next time you try Ekko build Sorc's + Alacrity (Distortion if you're playing him Top with TP), Rabadon's (GA if you're playing him Top), Zhonya's, Lich Bane, Morello's, Void Staff.

All you really need as Ekko is CDR, Magic Pen and Survive-ability and Lich Bane just makes for nice compound burst to single targets.
Maybe its something to do with his passive - Z Drive resonance. This stacks up to 3 times and triggers if you hit them quick enough, dealing extra damage and slowing the minions

Scuttle Crab gets stronger with every kill

Meaning, if that's the first time you killed it, it would only have had 800 HP. Full build = 1 shot.

Dragon Scuttle is killed more frequently, which is probably why you hardly scratched it. It may have been sitting on 2k HP.
im pretty sure scuttle is super weak and gets stronger every time you kill it. would not be surprised if you did.
Did Luden's Echo proc on both crabs or just the Baron one?
